CREATION_TYPE.COLLECTIVE_TOOLTIP: In a shared upload request, the recipients share the upload space and can thus see the other members' documents.
CREATION_TYPE.INDIVIDUAL_TOOLTIP: In a mass individual upload request, each recipient has his own personal upload space which the other members don't have access to.

FORM_CREATE.SUCCESS: The upload request has been created successfully!
FORM_CREATE.FORM_INVALID: Form is invalid. Please check your inputs carefully.

ERROR.INVALID_EXPIRATION_DATE: Expiration date must be between current date and {value}
ERROR.INVALID_ACTIVATION_DATE: Activation date must be between expiration date and {value}
ERROR.INVALID_NOTIFICATION_DATE: Notification date must be between {min} and {max}
ERROR.TOTAL_SIZE_OF_FILES_REQUIRED: Total size of files is required and smaller than {max}
ERROR.TOTAL_SIZE_OF_FILES_REQUIRED_ONLY: Total size of files is required
ERROR.MAX_NUMBER_OF_FILES_REQUIRED: Max number of files is required and smaller than {max}
ERROR.MAX_NUMBER_OF_FILES_REQUIRED_ONLY: Max number of files is required
ERROR.MAX_SIZE_OF_A_FILE_REQUIRED: Max size of a file is required and smaller than {max}
ERROR.MAX_SIZE_OF_A_FILE_REQUIRED_ONLY: Max size of a file is required

BACKGROUND_CONTENT.TITLE: Create upload requests
BACKGROUND_CONTENT.MESSAGE: These requests allow other users to upload files to your storage

ENTRY_LIST.TITLE: Uploaded files
ENTRY_LIST.MESSAGE: These files are uploaded from recipients of your upload request

ENTRY_LIST_PENDING.TITLE: No file uploaded
ENTRY_LIST_PENDING.MESSAGE: Upload request is not yet activated, recipients can not upload files at the moment

ENTRY_LIST_ARCHIVED.TITLE: Archived upload request
ENTRY_LIST_ARCHIVED.MESSAGE: Uploaded files are either removed or copied to your personal space

UPLOAD_REQUEST.TITLE: Upload request recipients
UPLOAD_REQUEST.MESSAGE: These are individual recipients of your created upload request

CANCELLATION.TITLE: Upload request cancelation
CANCELLATION.TEXT: You are about to cancel {singular, select, true{a upload request} other{{nbItems} upload requests}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.

CLOSE.TITLE: Upload request close
CLOSE.TEXT: You are about to close {singular, select, true{a upload request} other{{nbItems} upload requests}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.

ARCHIVE.TITLE: Upload request archive
ARCHIVE.TEXT: You are about to archive a upload request. Beware, this action cannot be undone.
ARCHIVE.OPTION_TEXT: After archiving, all files will be deleted. Do you want to copy files to your personal space?

DELETE_ARCHIVED.TITLE: Delete archived upload request
DELETE_ARCHIVED.TEXT: You are about to delete {singular, select, true{an archived upload request} other{{nbItems} archived upload requests}} ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.

ADD_RECIPIENTS.TITLE: Add recipients
ADD_RECIPIENTS.TEXT: You are about to add {singular, select, true {a recipient} other{{nbItems} recipients}} to this upload request ! Beware, this action cannot be undone.

DELETE_ENTRIES.TITLE: Delete uploaded files
DELETE_ENTRIES.TEXT: You are about to delete {singular, select, true{a uploaded files} other {{nbItems} uploaded files}}! Beware, this action cannot be undone.

CANCELLATION.ERROR: {number} {singular, select, true{upload request has} other{upload requests have}} not been canceled.
CANCELLATION.INFO: {number} {singular, select, true{upload request has} other{upload requests have}} been canceled.

CLOSE.ERROR: {number} {singular, select, true{upload request has} other{upload requests have}} not been closed.
CLOSE.INFO: {number} {singular, select, true{upload request has} other{upload requests have}} been closed.

ARCHIVE.ERROR: Upload request has not been archived.

DELETE_ARCHIVED.ERROR: {number} {singular, select, true{archived upload request has} other{archived upload requests have}} not been deleted.
DELETE_ARCHIVED.INFO: {number} {singular, select, true{archived upload request has} other{archived upload requests have}} been deleted.

ADD_RECIPIENTS.ERROR: {number} {singular, select, true{recipient has} other{recipients have}} not been added to the upload request.
ADD_RECIPIENTS.INFO: {number} {singular, select, true{recipient has} other{recipients have}} been added to the upload request.

DELETE_ENTRIES.ERROR: {number} {singular, select, true{uploaded file has} other{uploaded files have}} not been deleted.
DELETE_ENTRIES.INFO: {number} {singular, select, true{uploaded file has} other{uploaded file have}} been deleted.

COPY_ENTRIES.ERROR: Failed to copy {number} {singular, select, true{file} other{files}} to My Space.
COPY_ENTRIES.INFO: Copied {number} {singular, select, true{file} other{files}} to My Space.

UPDATE.ERROR: Upload request has not been updated.
UPDATE.INFO: The upload request has been updated successfully!
